Question.Subject: Help me move a picture.?
Question.Content: I can cut & paste copy from one place to another, but i still haven't figured out how to move pictures from one web page and paste it to another. Anyone with a simple step-by-step.......Thanks......Pipa Using XP Home
Question.ChosenAnswer: usually the picture will have to be posted on the web. like using a hosting site online (shutterfly) is just one of many. Right click picture, select properties and highlite url, copy, then go to where you want to post it. I believe this is what your looking for.

Answer.Content: usually the picture will have to be posted on the web. like using a hosting site online (shutterfly) is just one of many. Right click picture, select properties and highlite url, copy, then go to where you want to post it. I believe this is what your looking for.
